component.name: listTaskLists
component.description: Returns all the authenticated user's task lists.

component.name: getTaskList
component.description: Returns the authenticated user's specified task list.

component.name: insertTaskList
component.description: Creates a new task list and adds it to the authenticated user's task lists.

component.name: deleteTaskList
component.description: Deletes the authenticated user's specified task list.

component.name: updateTaskList
component.description: Updates the authenticated user's specified task list.

component.name: patchTaskList
component.description: Updates the authenticated user's specified task list. This method supports patch semantics
